settings.local_sources.title: Local sources
settings.local_sources.description: Add local folders to your Amethyst library, these will update whenever Amethyst detects file changes in these folders
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.performance.title: Performance
settings.metering.title: Metering
settings.audio.title: Audio
settings.media_sources.title: Media Sources
settings.media_sources.description: Organize folders, connect to servers and more
settings.keybinds.title: Keybinds
settings.keybinds.description: Customize key mappings for your experience
settings.integrations.title: Integrations
settings.font_weight.title: Font weight
settings.font_weight.description: How bold the font will be globally in the UI
settings.application.title: Application
settings.animation_duration.title: Animation duration
settings.animation_duration.description: How long animations will last in Amethyst across the UI
settings.ambient_background.title: Ambient background
settings.ambient_background.description: Presents an overlay of the cover art for the currently playing song on the UI
settings.ambient_background.spin_speed.d: How fast the background image will rotate
settings.ambient_background.opacity.desc: How visible the ambient art is over the app
settings.ambient_background.blur_strengt: How much blur to apply in px
settings.ambient_background.zoom.title: Zoom
settings.ambient_background.zoom.descrip: Adjusts the scaling of the ambient art, use it to make sure the art covers the entire screen
settings.ambient_background.blending_mod: Changes how the ambient background is blended with the background
settings.playback_controls.title: Playback controls
settings.playback_controls.description: Display the playback controls at the bottom of the application
settings.minimalist_mode.title: Minimalist mode
settings.minimalist_mode.description: Be less verbose on the UI to keep it clean
settings.neon_mode.title: Neon mode
settings.neon_mode.description: Changes the designs of certain UI elements to have a bloomy neon design
settings.cover_art.title: Cover art
settings.cover_art.description: Render the cover art near the playback controls located at the bottom of the interface
settings.debug_stats.title: Debug statistics
settings.debug_stats.description: Show numbers such as samples, fps, processor usage and more at the top bar
settings.discord_rpc.description: Discord Rich Presence allows users to share their current activity on Amethyst with Discord. When enabled, the RPC feature updates the user's Discord status to show the version of Amethyst, currently playing song or playlist, along with the artist and album
settings.auto_update.title: Automatic updates
settings.auto_update.description: Automatically check and install updates on startup
settings.launch_on_startup.title: Launch on startup
settings.launch_on_startup.description: Launch Amethyst when your system starts
settings.language.title: Language
settings.language.description: Change the language of the app
settings.fft_size.title: FFT size
settings.fft_size.description: Changes the Fast Fourier Transform window size, bigger values result in higher resolution data but with more latency
settings.decibel_meter.title: Decibel meter
settings.decibel_meter.description: Displays a visual representation of the sound level of the audio signal in decibels (dB). It displays the current sound level of the audio signal using a graph, where the y-axis represents the sound level in decibels. The decibel meter can be used to monitor the overall loudness of the audio signal and to ensure that it is within safe listening levels
settings.decibel_meter.separate_pre_post: Shows individual decibel meters, one for the signal before going into a node and one after
settings.decibel_meter.minimum_db.title: Minimum dB
settings.decibel_meter.minimum_db.descri: Changes the lowest value the decibel meter will register
settings.decibel_meter.smoothing_duratio: Smoothly animate between data-frames (useful for smoothing out small FFT sizes that create jitter)
settings.loudness_meter.title: Loudness meter
settings.loudness_meter.description: Displays a visual representation of the perceived loudness of the audio signal. The loudness meter is measured in Loudness Units Full Scale (LUFS), which is a standardized measurement of perceived loudness
settings.vectorscope.title: Vectorscope
settings.vectorscope.description: Displays a visual representation of the stereo audio signal. It displays the relative phase and stereo width of the audio signal using a circular graph. The vectorscope can be used to check the stereo imaging and phase coherence of the audio signal
settings.vectorscope.lissajous.title: Lissajous
settings.vectorscope.lissajous.descripti: Display diagonally in a lissajous pattern
settings.vectorscope.line_thickness.desc: Changes how thick / obvious the lines are
settings.spectrum_analyser.title: Spectrum analyzer
settings.spectrum_analyser.description: Displays a visual representation of the frequency content of the audio signal. It displays the frequency spectrum of the audio signal using a graph, where the x-axis represents the frequency range and the y-axis represents the amplitude. The spectrum analyzer can be used to analyze the frequency balance of the audio signal and to identify frequency peaks or notches
settings.vsync.title: VSync
settings.vsync.description: Constrain the user interface (UI) framerate of Amethyst to the refresh rate of the active display
settings.pause_visuals.title: Pause visuals when unfocused
settings.pause_visuals.description: Pause visualizers when tabbing out of Amethyst to reduce the performance hit (useful for gaming or multi-tasking)
settings.import_export.title: Import or export settings
settings.import_export.description: Backup your settings into a file or import existing settings
settings.reset.title: Reset settings
settings.reset.description: Reverts all settings to the factory default (can also help fix bug-stated clients)
